page.name: Background Readings
page.intro: Read these articles when you start this course. These articles will provide background knowledge and a common vocabulary about SCL.
page.content:
The first reading is about deeper learning and 21st century competencies from the NRC Report: Education for Life and Work: Guide for Practitioners.

The second reading is a TEAL Center Fact Sheet No. 12 on Deeper Learning through Questioning. Save this Fact Sheet for future reference and share with colleagues.

The third and fourth readings are about deeper learning in mathematics.

Capacity Building Series: Asking Effective Questions: Provoking Student Thinking/Deepening Conceptual Understanding in the Mathematics Classrom

Recommendation #2 in Improving Mathematical Problem Solving in Grades 4 Through 8:  A Practice Guide developed by the National Center for Education and Evaluation, pp. 17-22
